SELECT tsch.occr_dttm /* occr_dttm 발생_일시 character(14) */ , teb.loc_nm /*loc_nm 학교_명 varchar(100) */ , tsch.stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ , tsb.stdt_nm /*stdt_nm 학생_명 varchar(40) */ , fn_getcdnm('CBEE_USE_CD',tsch.cbee_use_cd) as cbee_use_cd_nm /* cbee_use_cd 캐시비_사용_코드 character varying(20) */ , tsch.use_cbee_amt /* use_cbee_amt 사용_캐시비_금액 numeric */ , tsch.cbee_bal /* cbee_bal 캐시비_잔액 numeric */ , tbi.tel_no /* tel_no 전화_번호 character varying(20) */ , tgb.guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ , tgb.guar_nm /* guar_nm 보호자_명 character varying(40) */ , tgb.guar_tel_no /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */ FROM ts_stdt_cbee_hist tsch inner join TM_STDT_BASE tsb --학생_기본 tsb on tsch.STDT_NO = tsb.STDT_NO inner join TS_BAND_INFO tbi --밴드_정보 tbi on tsb.BAND_ID = tbi.BAND_ID inner join TM_STDT_GUAR_CONN tsgc--학생_보호자_연결 tsgc on tsgc.STDT_NO = tsb.STDT_NO inner join TM_GUAR_BASE tgb --보호자_기본 tgb on tsgc.GUAR_NO = tgb.GUAR_NO left outer join TI_EORG_BASE teb --교육기관_기본 teb on tsb.EORG_LOC_NO = teb.LOC_NO WHERE 1 = 1 /*발생 일시*/ and tsch.occr_dttm between replace(#{occrDttmFr},'-','') and replace(#{occrDttmTo},'-','') /*학생_번호*/ and tsch.stdt_no = #{stdtNo}::NUMERIC /*학생_명*/ and tsb.stdt_NM like CONCAT('%',#{stdtNm},'%') /*학교(학원)명*/ and tsb.LOC_NM like CONCAT('%',#{locNm},'%') /*보호자_번호*/ and tgb.guar_no = #{guarNo}::NUMERIC /*보호자_명*/ and tsb.guar_NM like CONCAT('%',#{guarNm},'%') order by tsch.occr_dttm
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}
